cast.name: 鲍勃·吉尔道夫 Bob Geldof
James Dean Bradfield James Dean Bradfield

this_title: Ghost Blues: The Story of Rory Gallagher
trans_title: 幽灵蓝调：罗里.加拉格尔的故事
introduction: Directed by Ian Thuillier this film is a portrait of the late lamented musician Rory Gallagher, it investigates the timeless qualities of the 'gentleman', his music and the unique approach of this authentic guitar hero. His contribution to rock music has had a significant impact on both musicians and music fans around the world, despite his untimely death at the age of 47. The film features rare tracks from Rory's formative years with his first band, Taste, and through his 25 year solo career as he single-handedly spearheaded the Irish rock movement, blazing a trail for other Irish rock bands including Thin Lizzy, U2, etc. With featured contributions from those who knew him best; Donal Gallagher (his brother and manager), Bill Wyman, Cameron Crowe, and his former band members to those who he inspired to become music greats themselves; The Edge, Johnny Marr, Slash.
chinese_title: 幽灵蓝调：罗里.加拉格尔的故事
foreign_title: Ghost Blues: The Story of Rory Gallagher
